code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{ListOverviewContext}from"../../providers/ListOverviewProvider";import{UserContext}from"../../providers/UserProvider";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeleteList=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const{lists,deleteList}=useContext(ListOverviewContext);const{activeList,setActiveList}=useContext(UserContext);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();deleteList(activeList);setActiveList("");onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Are you sure you want to delete this list?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:lists.find(list=>list.id===activeList).name})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete list"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"})]});};export default DeleteList;
